languages.text: Полученных данных достаточно, чтобы выдвинуть теорию о значительной роли когитатора в планах культа. Рекомендуется незамедлительно отыскать машину и провести анализ угрозы. По словам лексмеханика, когитатор находится в палатах, вход в которые размещен в мануфакторуме.

The acquired data is enough to suggest a theory about the crucial role of the cogitator in the cult's plans. It would be wise to find the machine immediately and conduct a threat analysis. According to the Lexmechanic, the entrance to the chambers containing the cogitator is somewhere in the manufactorum.
languages.original_text: Полученных данных достаточно, чтобы выдвинуть теорию о значительной роли когитатора в планах культа. Рекомендуется незамедлительно отыскать машину и провести анализ угрозы. По словам лексмеханика, когитатор находится в палатах, вход в которые размещен в мануфакторуме.

traits.locale_text: The acquired data is enough to suggest a theory about the crucial role of the cogitator in the Cult's plans. It would be wise to find the machine immediately and conduct a threat analysis. According to the lexmechanic, the entrance to the chambers containing the cogitator is somewhere in the manufactorum.

The acquired data is enough to suggest a theory about the crucial role of the cogitator in the Cult's plans. It would be wise to find the machine immediately and conduct a threat analysis. According to the lexmechanic, the entrance to the chambers containing the cogitator is somewhere in the manufactorum.

The acquired data is enough to suggest a theory about the crucial role of the cogitator in the Cult's plans. It would be wise to find the machine immediately and conduct a threat analysis. According to the lexmechanic, the entrance to the chambers containing the cogitator is somewhere in the manufactorum.

The acquired data is enough to suggest a theory about the crucial role of the cogitator in the Cult's plans. It would be wise to find the machine immediately and conduct a threat analysis. According to the Lexmechanic, the entrance to the chambers containing the cogitator is somewhere in the manufactorum.

languages.text: 获得的数据足以表明，有一台沉思者或许会在邪教的计划中起到关键作用。行商浪人应当立即找到那台沉思者，进行威胁分析。根据思律机僧的说法，通往沉思者所在房间的入口就在制造工厂中的某个地方。
languages.original_text: The acquired data is enough to suggest a theory about the crucial role of the cogitator in the cult's plans. It would be wise to find the machine immediately and conduct a threat analysis. According to the Lexmechanic, the entrance to the chambers containing the cogitator is somewhere in the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: 获得的数据足以表明，有一台思考器或许会在邪教的计划中起到关键作用。行商浪人应当立即找到那台思考器，进行威胁分析。根据法律技工的说法，通往思考器所在房间的入口就在制造工厂中的某个地方。

languages.text: 取得されたデータは、教団の計画で考算機が果たす重要な役割に関する理論を示唆するに足るものだ。すぐにでもその機械を見つけて脅威分析を行うのが賢明だろう。法技術者によれば、考算機を収容する部屋への入り口は聖工場のどこかにあるという。
languages.original_text: The acquired data is enough to suggest a theory about the crucial role of the cogitator in the cult's plans. It would be wise to find the machine immediately and conduct a threat analysis. According to the Lexmechanic, the entrance to the chambers containing the cogitator is somewhere in the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: 取得されたデータは、教団の計画で考算機が果たす重要な役割に関する理論を示唆するに足るものだ。すぐにでもその機械を見つけて脅威分析を行うのが賢明だろう。法技術者によれば、考算機を収容する部屋への入り口は聖工場のどこかにあるという。

languages.text: Los datos obtenidos bastan para formular una teoría sobre el papel esencial desempeñado por el cogitador en los planes del Culto. Sería buena idea encontrar inmediatamente la máquina y ejecutar un análisis de amenazas. Según el lexmecánico, la entrada a las cámaras que albergan el cogitador está en alguna parte del manufactorum.
languages.original_text: The acquired data is enough to suggest a theory about the crucial role of the cogitator in the cult's plans. It would be wise to find the machine immediately and conduct a threat analysis. According to the Lexmechanic, the entrance to the chambers containing the cogitator is somewhere in the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: Los datos obtenidos bastan para formular una teoría sobre el papel esencial desempeñado por el cogitador en los planes del Culto. Sería buena idea encontrar inmediatamente la máquina y ejecutar un análisis de amenazas. Según el lexmecánico, la entrada a las cámaras que albergan el cogitador está en alguna parte del manufactorum.

languages.text: Die gesammelten Daten reichen aus, um eine Theorie über die wichtige Rolle des Cogitators für die Pläne des Kultes anzustellen. Es wäre klug, die Maschine umgehend aufzuspüren und eine Bedrohungsanalyse vorzunehmen. Dem Lexmechanicus zufolge befindet sich der Zugang zu den Kammern, in denen der Cogitator zu finden ist, irgendwo im Manufactorum.
languages.original_text: The acquired data is enough to suggest a theory about the crucial role of the cogitator in the cult's plans. It would be wise to find the machine immediately and conduct a threat analysis. According to the Lexmechanic, the entrance to the chambers containing the cogitator is somewhere in the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: Die gesammelten Daten reichen aus, um eine Theorie über die wichtige Rolle des Cogitators für die Pläne des Kultes anzustellen. Es wäre klug, die Maschine umgehend aufzuspüren und eine Bedrohungsanalyse vorzunehmen. Dem Lexmechanicus zufolge befindet sich der Zugang zu den Kammern, in denen der Cogitator zu finden ist, irgendwo im Manufactorum.

languages.text: Les données obtenues sont suffisantes pour présumer du rôle crucial du cogitateur dans les plans du culte. Il serait judicieux de trouver cette machine au plus vite et d'évaluer la menace qu'elle représente. D'après le lexmécanicien, l'entrée des salles contenant le cogitateur se trouve quelque part dans le manufactorum.
languages.original_text: The acquired data is enough to suggest a theory about the crucial role of the cogitator in the cult's plans. It would be wise to find the machine immediately and conduct a threat analysis. According to the Lexmechanic, the entrance to the chambers containing the cogitator is somewhere in the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: Les données obtenues sont suffisantes pour présumer du rôle crucial du cogitateur dans les plans du culte. Il serait judicieux de trouver cette machine au plus vite et d'évaluer la menace qu'elle représente. D'après le lexmécanicien, l'entrée des salles contenant le cogitateur se trouve quelque part dans le manufactorum.

languages.text: Elde edilen veriler, Tarikat'ın planlarında kavramsayarın hayati rolü hakkında bir teori ortaya koymak için yeterli seviyede. Makineyi hemen bulup tehlike analizi gerçekleştirmek akıllıca olacaktır. Lexmekanik'e göre kavramsayarın bulunduğu odanın girişi, manufaktorumda bir yerlerde olmalı.
languages.original_text: The acquired data is enough to suggest a theory about the crucial role of the cogitator in the cult's plans. It would be wise to find the machine immediately and conduct a threat analysis. According to the Lexmechanic, the entrance to the chambers containing the cogitator is somewhere in the manufactorum.
